local_intent: lower_until_contact_then place on red_plate_center and verify release
assumptions: Pose 'red_plate_center' is available on the blackboard
Contact sensing and gripper release are functioning
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'place' phase: verify pose, move above red plate, lower until contact, place, release, retreat, and confirm object released; consistent with GLOBAL_BT and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION.
